TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WindowsFormsComponentEditor extends System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor
Public MustInherit Class WindowsFormsComponentEditor Inherits ComponentEditor
public ref class WindowsFormsComponentEditor abstract : System::ComponentModel::ComponentEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a base class for editors that use a modal dialog to display a properties page similar to an ActiveX control's property page.

remarks.format:
